Types
NetworkMessageType
enum NetworkMessages::NetworkMessageType {...}

Network message types

Values
SVC_TEMPENTITY

(23) Creates temporary entities on the client side.

SVC_INTERMISSION

(30) Enables intermission for clients.

SVC_STUFFTEXT

(9) Executes command on the client side.
